function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced physical activity due to Covid-related restrictions","Impact":"Increased mental health problems","Mitigation":"Encourage and facilitate alternative forms of physical activity, mental health support","Technologies":"Online fitness programs, mental health apps","People":"General public, especially those affected by restrictions","Owner":"Health organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Economic and financial distress as a barrier to physical exercise","Impact":"Decreased participation in physical activity","Mitigation":"Financial support, community initiatives, awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Financial assistance programs, community engagement platforms","People":"Those facing financial distress due to pandemic","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Inequality in physical exercise among college students","Impact":"Low physical self-esteem, gender disparities, reduced mental and physical health","Mitigation":"Promotion of inclusive exercise culture, targeted support for vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Online fitness resources, educational platforms","People":"College students, especially girls and vulnerable groups","Owner":"Educational institutions, health organizations"}]}
